---
title: How to use AccelByte TypeScript SDK
description: Learn how to use every AGS endpoint using AccelByte TypeScript SDK
---

# AccelByte TypeScript SDK

In the documents below, there will be snippets of inserting Bearer token manually. Keep in mind that these are only required for server-to-server calls. In case of browsers, usually you will use cookies (which are processed automatically by IAM), so the `axiosConfig` argument that comes after the `sdk` argument is not required to be passed.

## Usage with ESM

- [AMS](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-ams.md)
- [Achievements](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-achievement.md)
- [Basic](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-basic.md)
- [Audit](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-audit.md)
- [Build Info](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-buildinfo.md)
- [Challenge](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-challenge.md)
- [Chat](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-chat.md)
- [Cloud Save](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-cloudsave.md)
- [Event Log](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-event.md)
- [GDPR](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-gdpr.md)
- [Groups](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-groups.md)
- [IAM](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-iam.md)
- [Inventory](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-inventory.md)
- [Leaderboard](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-leaderboard.md)
- [Legal](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-legal.md)
- [Lobby](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-lobby.md)
- [Login Queue](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-login-queue.md)
- [Matchmaking](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-matchmaking.md)
- [QOS Manager](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-qosmanager.md)
- [Reporting](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-reporting.md)
- [Season Pass](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-seasonpass.md)
- [Session](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-session.md)
- [Statistics](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-social.md)
- [UGC](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-ugc.md)
- [Platform](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-platform.md)
- [Custom Service Manager](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-csm.md)
- [Extend Helper Service](https://accelbyte.github.io/accelbyte-typescript-sdk/usage/esm/sdk-ehs.md)
